posts.title: Orbit Capital Announces Strategic $40B Investment from Jongen & Jongen
posts.author: Orbit Capital and Jongen & Jongen
posts.excerpt: We are thrilled to announce that Orbit Capital has secured a landmark strategic investment of $40 billion from Jongen & Jongen, valuing Orbit Capital at $300 billion.

posts.title: Orbit Capital Leads $50M Series A in T7 Chat
posts.author: Orbit Capital
posts.excerpt: We are excited to announce that Orbit Capital has led a $50 million Series A funding round in T7 Chat, a cutting-edge AI chat platform designed for seamless user experiences.
